import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { StoreService } from '../../services/store.service' @Component({ selector: 'app-nav', templateUrl: './nav.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav.component.scss'] }) export class NavComponent implements OnInit { activeMenu = false; counter = 0; constructor( private storeService: StoreService ) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.storeService.myCart$.subscribe(products => { this.counter = products.length; }); } toggleMenu() { this.activeMenu = !this.activeMenu; } }
